Articles.Content:
I was wondering if there was a way to create a secondary window in a single KSP instance to be placed on a secondary (or primary) monitor that can serve as an MDI parent form for other mods to display their GUI's inside, rather than being stuck using Unity's GUI system within the game and cluttering the screen.

Edited May 27, 2017 by Xyphos

There is a way but unfortunately the version of Unity used by KSP does not handle it well (if at all).

You can add windows/monitors but you can not use any UI in it because the engine always report the mouse to be in the main window/monitor.

 

Edited May 27, 2017 by sarbian
